Author: amichail
Content:
So what would the default view be? Is there a view that would work for most sports?

Also what about having flying robocams? How would they work?

Author: sam
Content: Just use a software solution. Put 6 or or so cameras pointing out radially and then stitch the views together for a full 4pi view. No need for a fancy gyroscope. There's an idea for a startup...

Author: phil
Title: Marc Andreessen: The Truth About Venture Capitalists, Part 3
